Find the area of the load water plane and the longitudinal position of its centroid. The length of the ship is 250 ft.

5. Draw the quadrant of a circle of radius r, and the double ordinate AB from the centre to the circumference. Prove that the distance of the parabola from the directrix is equal to the distance from the focus.
